linkedList.node

Class SingleLinkNode<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • linkedList.node.SingleLinkNode<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object to be stored in these nodes.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListNode<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleLinkNode

    public class SingleLinkNode<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListNode<T>
    Defines a basic linked list node
    Version:
    October 2019
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private SingleLinkNode<T> next
      Pointer to the next node.
      private T value
      The value held in this node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SingleLinkNode(T value)
      Constructs a "tail" node --- a node with no following node
      SingleLinkNode(T value, SingleLinkNode<T> next)
      Constructs a "non-tail" node --- a node with following nodes

                      SingleLinkNode<T> next)
